visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: Chart type: spline, Chart title: Monthly Average Temperature, Axes and labels styling: Labels and titles should be in Arial font, size 12, and color #333333. Axes should have a grid line color of #CCCCCC. Data series: The series should be named 'Temperature' with data [29.9, 71.5, 106.4, 129.2, 144.0, 176.0, 135.6, 148.5, 216.4, 194.1, 95.6, 54.4]. Custom colors: Use a gradient from #00bfff to #1e90ff for the series. Additional configurations: Set the chart background to #f9f9f9, add a legend at the bottom, and set the chart margins to 50 pixels on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is set to a light gray (#f9f9f9). The chart margins are set to 50 pixels on all sides to provide ample space around the chart. The x-axis and y-axis labels and titles are styled with Arial font, size 12, and color #333333. The axes also have grid lines colored #CCCCCC. The data series is named 'Temperature' and includes monthly temperature data. The series color is a gradient from #00bfff to #1e90ff. Additionally, a legend is placed at the bottom of the chart for better readability.
